changeSet.author: behrmann
changeSet.comment: Update trash trigger to add an itype 0 marker to trash.
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE TRIGGER tgr_locationinfo_trash2 AFTER DELETE ON t_inodes REFERENCING OLD ROW old FOR EACH ROW INSERT INTO t_locationinfo_trash VALUES (old.ipnfsid, 2, '', 0, now(), now(), 1)

changeSet.author: behrmann
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO t_tags_inodes2 (SELECT * FROM t_tags_inodes i WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_tags t WHERE t.itagid = i.itagid))
INSERT INTO t_tags_inodes SELECT * FROM t_tags_inodes2
